attributes.action: Get a Dental NHS Service that works in Britain for Adults & Children in Pain.
attributes.additional_details: Personally i had to get Private Dental work done on all my Teeth as i was suffering in pain. Plus why should my Son have to go to London just to get an Appointment to see someone. Which is a 75 mile journey one way. The British Government charter flights at a cost of £250,000 Minimum to take refugees to different Countries and it cost me £15,000 just to fix my teeth the Way i wanted it done. I had to go Abroad to fix this Situation. Why can we not do the Same for Children & adults in Britain.
attributes.background: The Government should get more involved with the Whole NHS Services regarding this. As British Children are Suffering in Pain to get Dental work Done and Adults.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625518
